description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for two (2) Training and Simulation Kits for use with the in-service AP4C Automatic Chemical Agent Detector (NSN: 6665-14-554-4482) manufactured by PROENGIN (St-Cyr l’sécole, France). The SimTool Kit (PROENGIN Part # M2852 E00 000) enables simultaneous connection to multiple AP4C detectors in order to receive and display live agent detection and status information on a computer or tablet as part of a training event.

full_summary:
=====================================

### Advanced Notice of Contract Award

#### Simulation Toolkit Tender

The Department of National Defence invites tenders for the procurement of two (2) Training and Simulation Kits for the AP4C Automatic Chemical Agent Detector. The kits will enable the simultaneous connection to multiple AP4C detectors for live agent detection and status information display on a computer or tablet during training events.

#### Contract Details

*   **Contract Number:** W6399-24-LO97/A
*   **Amendment:** 1
*   **Publication Date:** February 27, 2024
*   **Closing Date:** March 18, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Contract Start Date:** April 5, 2024
*   **Contract End Date:** April 5, 2025

#### Supply Requirements

The following UNSPSC codes are applicable for this tender:

*   *46151900 - Chemical biological control equipment and accessories and supplies*
*   *46200000 - Defense and law enforcement and security and safety training equipment*

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the Advance Contract Award Notice, can be downloaded from the CanadaBuys website:

*   [English](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33043/01_w6399_24_lo97_acan_eng.pdf)
*   [French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33043/01a_w6399_24_lo97_acan_fr.pdf)
